Plot: 23-year-old Meera meets a guy in a bus on her way to work. A casual fun chat with him soon triggers off a series of unpleasant events and Meera realizes that she has become an obsession for...
Title: Psycho
Writer: Rohit Banawalikar (script), A. Sreedhar (dialogue), Ram Gopal Varma (story)
Actors: Kiren Jogi, Vijay Kashyap, Priyanka Kothari, Raj Shroff
